meanings.sent1: She accidentally bumped her chinbone on the table.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined her chinbone during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his chinbone was tired from all the talking.
meanings.sent4: Her chinbone was as strong as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The chinbone is essential for chewing and speaking.

meanings.definition: The bone forming the lower part of the face in vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The cat's chinbone was injured in the accident.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the structure of the chinbone in different species.
meanings.sent3: The chinbone of the dinosaur fossil looked quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as a chinbone.
meanings.sent5: The chinbone provides support for the lower face in animals.
